TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HandleExternalEventActivity extends System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity implements class System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity, class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.IActivityEventListener`1<class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.QueueEventArgs>, class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.IDynamicPropertyTypeProvider
Public Class HandleExternalEventActivity Inherits Activity Implements IActivityEventListener(Of QueueEventArgs), IDynamicPropertyTypeProvider, IEventActivity

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 定义用于处理由本地服务引发的事件的工作流通信活动。

span.span: Defines a workflow communication activity that is used to handle an event that is raised by a local service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 本地服务是一个类，该类实现本地服务接口（使用 标记的接口）并被添加到 。A local service is a class that implements a local service interface (an interface that is marked with ) and is added to the . 在 服务引发具有从 派生的事件数据的事件时， 接收数据。The receives data when the service raises an event with event data derived from . 是阻止活动。The is a blocking activity. 从 派生的类不应实现 接口，因为没有正确执行派生的类。Classes that derive from should not implement the interface because the derived class does not execute correctly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 类并设置其值。The following code example shows how to create and set values for the class. 此代码示例摘自 DocumentApprovalWorkflow.cs 文件中的“RaiseEventToLoadWorkflow”SDK 示例。This code example is part of the RaiseEventToLoadWorkflow SDK sample from the DocumentApprovalWorkflow.cs file. [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [引发事件以加载工作流](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/71330ada-adcd-42a9-8b38-468d8a0cfb80)。 [Raise Event To Load Workflow](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/71330ada-adcd-42a9-8b38-468d8a0cfb80). MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken CorrelationToken { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property CorrelationToken As CorrelationToken

public: virtual property System::Workflow::Runtime::CorrelationToken ^ CorrelationToken { System::Workflow::Runtime::CorrelationToken ^ get(); void set(System::Workflow::Runtime::CorrelationToken ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置到 的绑定。

span.span: Gets or sets the binding to a .

Docs.value:
此属性用于基于事件的负载将事件与继承 的正确活动建立关联。
This property is used to correlate an event to the correct -inherited activity based on the payload of the event.
例如，当单个工作流实例同时侦听同一事件的多个实例时，可以使用 属性将事件路由到该工作流实例中正确的活动。
For example, when a single workflow instance is listening for multiple instances of the same event at the same time, the property is used to route the event to the proper activity in that workflow instance.
不要将此关联与将事件与正确的工作流实例建立关联相混淆。
This correlation should not be confused with correlating an event to the correct workflow instance.
与正确的工作流实例建立关联是通过将事件发送到显式工作流实例并使用 属性正确地标识正确的工作流实例来完成的。
The correlation to the correct workflow instance is done by sending the event to an explicit workflow instance and using the property to properly identify the correct workflow instance.
[!INCLUDE[crexample](~/includes/crexample-md.md)] 关联，请参阅[关联本地服务示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd)。 correlation, see the [Correlated Local Service Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd).

remarks.format: ## Examples 以下示例演示如何访问 `CorrelationToken` 的 `HandleExternalEventActivity` 属性。The following example shows how to access the `CorrelationToken` property of a `HandleExternalEventActivity`. 此示例摘自 CorrelatedLocalServiceWorkflow.designer.cs 文件的“相关的本地服务”SDK 示例。This example is from the Correlated Local Service SDK sample, from the CorrelatedLocalServiceWorkflow.designer.cs file. [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [关联本地服务示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd)。 [Correlated Local Service Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd). summary.span: 在接收到外部事件后立即调用，以在活动关闭之前使派生类可以处理入站 。

span.span: Called just after the external event is received to allow derived classes to process the inbound before the activity closes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生类中 方法的最常见用途是从接收的 中提取成员，以便设置派生类活动的公共属性的值。The most common use of the method in derived classes is to extract members from the received to set the values of the derived-classed activity's public properties. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 `OnInvoked` 方法的实现。The following example shows an implementation of the `OnInvoked` method. 此示例摘自 TaskCompleted.cs 文件的“相关的本地服务”SDK 示例。This example is from the Correlated Local Service SDK sample, from the TaskCompleted.cs file. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在编译时用于验证属性相互之间是否正确绑定。Used at compile time to validate whether the properties are correctly bound to one other. 如果没有此接口，则会直接从属性的 getter/setter 推断此信息。Without this interface, this information is inferred directly from property getter/setters.
